DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The primary objective clinical trial characterize metabolic signature associate abdominal fat distribution 40 woman different BMI 29-40 different abdominal distribution fat ( visceral vs. sub-cutaneous fat ) . No intervention product plan . The subject give one high fat meal commercial product ( egg , milk , cream , bread , fruit , cheese cheese ) one test day test post-prandial metabolic response .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolism Associated With Abdominal Fat Mass Distribution
DOC.criteria: BMI 2940 kg/m2 Aged 2545 Diagnosed metabolic disorder Diabetes type 1 2 , cardiovascular disease , metabolic syndrome Pregnancy Any pathology ( infectious ) require antibiotic therapy within 1 month prior begin study . Any therapy ( contraception apart ) within runin period one week test day . Subject expect comply treatment measure . Subject affect specific eat disorder Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 3 month prior begin study . Subjects recently undergone weight loss 3 kilo last 3 month
